title: True Religion Men's Rocco Super T Flap 1/2" 32"
description: Signature Super T Stitching: Features True Religion's iconic Super T stitching for a bold and distinctive look.
High-Quality Denim: Made from premium denim that ensures long-lasting comfort and durability.
Modern Rocco Fit: Offers a slim, modern silhouette that enhances your style while providing comfort.
Flap Pockets with Button Closures: Includes stylish and functional flap pockets with secure button closures.
Versatile Style: Suitable for a variety of casual and semi-casual occasions, making these jeans a versatile wardrobe staple.

Upgrade your denim collection with the True Religion Men's Rocco Super T Flap 1/2" Jeans, featuring a 32" inseam. These jeans are designed with True Religion's signature Super T stitching, delivering bold and eye-catching detailing. The Rocco fit offers a modern, slim silhouette that enhances your style while providing comfort and flexibility. Made from high-quality denim, these jeans are built to last and provide exceptional comfort. The flap pockets with button closures add a rugged, stylish touch, making these jeans perfect for a variety of casual and semi-casual occasions.
